items.content_html: Visual Studio Code combines the simplicity of a code editor with what developers need for their core edit-build-debug cycle. It provides comprehensive code editing, navigation, and understanding support along with lightweight debugging, a rich extensibility model, and lightweight integration with existing tools.
items.title: Git-Hub-Chris/Visual-Studio-Code: Visual Studio Code combines the simplicity of a code editor with what developers need for their core edit-build-debug cycle. It provides comprehensive code editing, navigation, and understanding support along with lightweight debugging, a rich extensibility model, and lightweight integration with existing tools.

items.content_html: Compress your PDFs effortlessly with this lightweight and fast tool. Features include drag-and-drop upload, custom compression levels, batch processing, real-time progress, and instant downloads. Perfect for quick and hassle-free PDF optimization! 🚀
